context: Good afternoon. What sort of movie are you in the mood for?
Hey there, i'm looking for movies like Tron (1982) n or Transformers (2007) mers because I loved those.

resp: I have to say, if you haven't seen Tron: Legacy (2010) , I loved it. I know the reviews weren't always kind, but I personally enjoyed it.
